headline.main: Sacrificing Freud; By arrogating to itself the task of humanizing the world, the psychiatric priesthood--itself torn between 'Catholics' and 'Protestants'-- hastens the nightmare of a society run by doctors.

docs.abstract: Christopher Lasch article on psychiatry as 'a new religion'; discusses Freudian psychiatry, as well as factions led by Adler and Jung; drawings of Freud (L)
